title: Hnam tin hnenah thu puan tur chu kan nei
lyrics:
Hnam tin hnenah thu puan tur chu kan nei,
Thu dik lamah hawitir turin;
Chanchin Tha leh lawmawm tak chu,
Muanna leh enna thu chu.

Khaw thim chu khawvarah a chang ang,
Khawvar pawh chhunah a chang ang;
Krista ram chu leiah a thleng ang,
Hmangaihna leh eng ram chu.

Hnam tin hnenah hla sak tur chu kan nei,
Lalpa lamah hawitir turin;
Hla thar, sualna zawng hneh theitu,
Ngunhnam, fei titliak theitu.

Hnam tin hnenah thu hril tur chu kan nei,
Vana Lal, Roreltua chuan,
A Fa a rawn tir min tlan nan,
Pathian hmangaih puang turin.

Hnam tin tan Chhandamtu puan tur kan nei,
Lungngaih hrehawm tuartua chu;
Khawvel hnam zawng zawngin amah
Pthian a nih an hriat nan.
